snippet: Sheriff Joe Arpaio of Maricopa County is spending $1 million to buy 700 body cameras as part of a court ruling that found his office racially profiled Latino drivers, the company selling the cameras said Friday.
abstract: Maricopa County, Ariz, Sheriff Joe Arpaio is spending $1 million on body cameras to record deputies' actions in field after court found his office had racially profiled Latinos during traffic stops.
lead_paragraph: Sheriff Joe Arpaio of Maricopa County is spending $1 million to buy 700 body cameras as part of a court ruling that found his office racially profiled Latino drivers, the company selling the cameras said Friday.

headline.main: Arizona: Maricopa Deputies Will Get Body Cameras
headline.print_headline: Arizona: Maricopa Deputies Will Get Body Cameras
